name: bobbie kahler
text: If you're at the loves truck stop, in Angola IN.  They have an excellent antipasto salad, and Italian subs. Not your every day sub either. It's kinda a mix between a calzone and a sub. Very good food. They'll bring it right to your truck. ‚Ä¶More

text: Hungry Howie's has exceptional pizza that is consistently good. Great distribution of toppings, great cheese pull on the slice, flavored crust options are quit delicious, and the freshness of the toppings are key. The pizza is always hot ‚Ä¶More

text: Stuck in my work truck down here from out of state. They gladly delivered to my truck in the parking lot I was in. Delivery made it in 35 mins. Both staff on the phone and the driver were awesome. PIZZA WAS HOT AND LOOKED AMAZING!! Thank you! Great experience!
